Estate Lite Theme
=================

Estate Lite Theme is a Free Plone Theme from Quintagroup. It is a lite version of premium Estate Plone Theme.
  
Current verison of Estate Lite Theme was tested with Plone 4.0 
  
Features
--------

* Second-column portlets placed at the bottom of the content area
* Default search is replaced with Search portlet
* Semantic mark-up
 
Home Directory
--------------

http://skins.quintagroup.com/estate-lite

-------

* Volodymyr Rudnytskyi
